column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////They have the most delicious and authentic Chicago style deep dish pizzas!!! Sadly
column2: you really can't find pizza like this anywhere else in the nation. I've recently moved to California and can't seem to find a restaurant with acceptable deep dish pizzas. :( If you're in the Chicago area
column3: these pizzas are a definite must have! My favorite is the Malnati Chicago Classic. :)
